summary: This is an automated email notification from a claims management system (ClaimFox) regarding a request for records from USAA - Criminal Banking related to Ghislaine Maxwell. It indicates a request for financial records is being prepared in connection with a criminal case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The document is a notification that a request for banking records from USAA, categorized under 'Criminal Banking', is being prepared for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Records Request Notification
events.description: An automated system notifies that a request for banking records from USAA related to Ghislaine Maxwell is being prepared.

keyFacts: A formal request for banking records from USAA was made concerning Ghislaine Maxwell, categorized under 'Criminal Banking'.
The request was being processed via a claims management portal (ClaimFox) with associated claim and invoice numbers.
The notification email is dated December 24, 2019, indicating ongoing investigative activity related to Maxwell's finances at that time.
